projects.discription: In this project, I have practiced the knowledge of basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator, a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button.

In this project, I have enhanced the usability of a web page that contains a long list by employing JavaScript to dynamically divide the list into 'pages'. Added a search feature to display only the students that match the search criteria.

Full Stack JavaScript developers create forms to collect information from users for nearly every website and application they build. For this project, I have used my skills to enhance a form so that it’s engaging, interactive, and easy to use.

In this project, I have built a functional Tic Tac Toe game with AI opponent. I'll use the provided mockups, HTML, CSS and image files to create a game that requires players to add their names, take turns adding an X or O to the game board, and announce when the game ends. I have kept track of the state of the game -- whose turn it is, where the X's and O's are on the board, and whether the game is a draw or, if not, who won and lost.

projects.project_name: Use a Public API to Create an Employee Directory
projects.discription: In this project, I have used the Random User Generator API (https://randomuser.me/) to grab information for 12 random “employees,” and used that data to build a prototype for an Awesome Startup employee directory. I have requested a JSON object from the API and parse the data so that 12 employees are listed in a grid with their thumbnail image, full name, email, and location. Clicking the employee’s image or name will open a modal window with more detailed information, such as the employee’s birthday and address.

In this project, I’ve been given the task to create a Node.js command line application that goes to an ecommerce site to get the latest prices and save them to a spreadsheet (CSV format). I have writen the application as if the spreadsheet will be used by another application to populate a database. The application I built will run once every day. I have used npm modules to assist me in the project. I have to research and use npm packages that will help me scrape a website and create a CSV file.
